metadata.title: CVE-2023-27985 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
emacsclient-mail.desktop in Emacs 28.1 through 28.2 is vulnerable to shellcommand injections through a crafted mailto: URI. This is related to lackof compliance with the Desktop Entry Specification. It is fixed in 29.0.90

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27985` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

emacs - 29.4+1-3ubuntu1
emacs-bin-common - 29.4+1-3ubuntu1
emacs-common - 29.4+1-3ubuntu1
emacs-el - 29.4+1-3ubuntu1
emacs-gtk - 29.4+1-3ubuntu1
emacs-lucid - 29.4+1-3ubuntu1
emacs-nox - 29.4+1-3ubuntu1
emacs-pgtk - 29.4+1-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: emacs package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '29.4+1-3ubuntu1').
xemacs21 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
